properties.name: spring.cloud.task.batch.listener.enabled
properties.description: This property is used to determine if a task will be linked to the batch jobs that are run.

properties.name: spring.cloud.task.batch.fail-on-job-failure
properties.description: This property is used to determine if a task app should return with a non zero exit code if a batch job fails.

properties.name: spring.cloud.task.batch.events.enabled
properties.description: This property is used to determine if a task should listen for batch events.

properties.name: spring.cloud.task.batch.events.chunk.enabled
properties.description: This property is used to determine if a task should listen for batch chunk events.

properties.name: spring.cloud.task.batch.events.item-process.enabled
properties.description: This property is used to determine if a task should listen for batch item processed events.

properties.name: spring.cloud.task.batch.events.item-read.enabled
properties.description: This property is used to determine if a task should listen for batch item read events.

properties.name: spring.cloud.task.batch.events.item-write.enabled
properties.description: This property is used to determine if a task should listen for batch item write events.

properties.name: spring.cloud.task.batch.events.job-execution.enabled
properties.description: This property is used to determine if a task should listen for batch job execution events.

properties.name: spring.cloud.task.batch.events.skip.enabled
properties.description: This property is used to determine if a task should listen for batch skip events.

properties.name: spring.cloud.task.batch.events.step-execution.enabled
properties.description: This property is used to determine if a task should listen for batch step execution events.
